Petunia.text: My gosh! I just can't believe it! "My beautiful flowers dead like cattle!" She hasn't yet noticed your presence.

The woman proceeded to turn around "My gosh dear, don't sneak up on me like that. I might have a heart attack!" She exclaimed dramatically. "My name is Petunia, this is my garden or was more accurately..."

options.text: I'm sure it could still be salvaged.
Looks like you should have taken a better care of it.

Petunia.text: You decide to leave Petunia to her thoughts.
